title: Shounin Skill De Maoujou No Kouryaku Wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita No De Saikyou Item To Tookujutsu De Ikinuku To Ni Shita~
alternative_title: 商人スキルで魔王城の攻略を目指す ～異世界転移したので最強アイテムとトーク術で生き抜くことにした～ ; Aiming to Conquer the Demon King's Castle with Merchant Skills: Since I Have Been Transported to Another World, I Decided to Survive with the Strongest Items and Talk Techniques
status: 商人スキルで魔王城の攻略を目指す ～異世界転移したので最強アイテムとトーク術で生き抜くことにした～ ; Aiming to Conquer the Demon King's Castle with Merchant Skills: Since I Have Been Transported to Another World, I Decided to Survive with the Strongest Items and Talk Techniques
description:
Description :
        One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!? 
Win the hearts of the demi-human girls living in Demon King's Castle and aim to escape from Demon King's Castle! A fantasy romantic comedy that opens up a different world with its natural business spirit, begins!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 3: Store Opening And The Cat
